name: Strong Comeback
description: You learn quickly from past mistakes.
benefit: Whenever you are allowed to reroll an ability check, a skill check, or a saving throw, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus on the reroll.
mythicDescription: You never make the same mistake twice.
mythicBenefit: Whenever youâ€™re allowed to reroll an ability check, a skill check, or a saving throw, roll two dice and take the higher result, before adding the bonus from Strong Comeback.
